name: McAloo Tikki
description: Spiced potato and peas patty in a bun, topped with special McAloo sauce and fresh lettuce.

name: McChicken
description: Crispy chicken patty with mayonnaise and shredded lettuce in a sesame seed bun.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy golden fries with just the right amount of salt.

name: Veg Pizza McPuff
description: A savory snack filled with pizza-style vegetables and cheese in a crispy pastry.

name: Filet-O-Fish
description: Mild fish fillet with tartar sauce and half a slice of cheese in a steamed bun.

name: Big Mac
description: Two all-beef patties, special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, onions on a sesame seed bun.

name: Chicken Nuggets
description: Crispy golden chicken nuggets served with your choice of dipping sauce.

name: Spicy Paneer Burger
description: Spicy paneer patty with tandoori sauce, onions, and lettuce in a soft bun.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Classic burger with beef patty and melted cheese, topped with pickles, onions, ketchup and mustard.

name: Veg Maharaja Mac
description: A double-decker delight with spicy veg patties, jalapenos, and cheese in a signature bun.
